course.title: ADM 4345 Management Control Systems (3 units)
course.desc: Integrates the various concepts of procedures that make up a managerial planning and control system from an accounting, performance measurement, behavioural, organisational design, and strategy implementation point of view. The course emphasizes modern performance measurement and control techniques in the context of changing competitive environments.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: ADM 3346. Courses reserved for BCom. students with a min. of 33 units from ADM core courses, including ADM 2381; in minors or in certificate programs when the course is required.
